sentences.en: Chantelle Qian is bright, personable and resourceful.
sentences.cn: 钱特利·钱(ChantelleQian)聪明 、 机敏而且讨人喜欢.

sentences.en: He's a very personable young man, but his work does not really come up to scratch.
sentences.cn: 他是个很英俊的年轻人, 但实在不能胜任工作.

sentences.en: I think clinics are more personable than big hospitals.
sentences.cn: 我认为诊所比大医院来得更有人情味.
我的身材很高,我的态度也很文雅.

sentences.en: I'M PERSONABLE: I give lots of unsolicited personal advice to co - workers.
sentences.cn: “ 本人人缘颇好”: 我经常多管闲事,给同事出瘦主意.

sentences.en: Jeremy excepted, the men seemed personable.
sentences.cn: 除杰里米外，那些男人看起来都风度翩翩。

sentences.en: Keep the tone personable and look for ways to convey your passions.
sentences.cn: 保持优雅的语调,及时传达出你的热情.

sentences.en: Nobody knew that the mysterious hero was a personable young man.
sentences.cn: 没人知道那个神秘的英雄竟是位翩翩少年.

sentences.en: Personable and humorous, he has a reputation as one of the guys of business education.
sentences.cn: 风度翩翩、幽默风趣的莱特教授,是商业教育界出了名的大好人之一.

sentences.en: She is not only a personable person, but also a capable and knowledgeable one.
sentences.cn: 她不但讨人喜欢, 也是一位能干有见识的人.

sentences.en: The people I met were intelligent, mature, personable.
sentences.cn: 我见到的是一些聪明、成熟、品貌兼优的人。

sentences.en: The salesman was a very personable young man.
sentences.cn: 推销员是个风度翩翩的年轻人.

sentences.en: The will is not effective until it is signed by a personable person.
sentences.cn: 直到具有权力能力和行为能力的人签字以后,这个遗嘱才生效.

sentences.en: Your are an amazingly thoughtful, personable, supportive and caring person to your friends.
sentences.cn: 您是位非常体贴 、 讨人喜欢 、 乐于助人和关心朋友的人.
